pros: -quite easy manual job -little charity shop that is cared about by managers and the team - interesting changing tasks and fast-paced environment - low level of micromenegement and stress -friendly atmosphere
cons: - might be stressful at times when it is crowded (basically as in any shop) - long hours standing - the team is ready to help but in general I felt a bit separated - a bit tense managers due to the amount of work
Work load is exhausting Face does not fit culture HR not fit for purpose
